title: WOLFROB
description: The incredible journey of a boy in an orphanage who would later become one of the FBI’s most hunted fugitives; an escape artist credited with robbing more than 100 banks. A luxurious life of money and menage-a-trois’ – and stolen freedoms.Brilliantly written, this gentleman-gangster shares his life of dramatic escapes from jail, bold crimes of robbery, steamy sexual adventures; his passionate love triangle with two beautiful women, dangerous double life, dogged pursuit by the FBI; and his treacherous path through the most notorious prisons in the nation - that leads to a shocking tragedy.A task force comprised of the Federal Bureau of Investigation and the U.S. Marshals Service was formed to apprehend Robert Brame. Internally, because it appeared that he was operating as a lone wolf, they gave him the code name: Wolfrob.
author: Robert Brame
